item.name: üì° WebSocket Testing Guide
item.description: Since Postman doesn't support STOMP WebSocket, use these alternative testing methods

request.description:
üì° WEBSOCKET CONNECTION INFO
================================

üîó WebSocket URL: ws://localhost:8081/ws
üîó With SockJS: http://localhost:8081/ws

üîê AUTHENTICATION
-----------------
Pass JWT token as query parameter:
ws://localhost:8081/ws?token=YOUR_JWT_TOKEN

Or in STOMP CONNECT frame headers:
{
  "Authorization": "Bearer YOUR_JWT_TOKEN"
}

üì® MESSAGE DESTINATIONS
-----------------------

1Ô∏è‚É£ CHANNEL MESSAGES
Subscribe: /topic/channel/{channelId}
Send: /app/channel/{channelId}/message
Payload:
{
  "content": "Hello everyone!",
  "channelId": 1,
  "senderId": 1
}

2Ô∏è‚É£ DIRECT MESSAGES
Subscribe: /user/queue/messages
Send: /app/direct-message
Payload:
{
  "content": "Hey there!",
  "senderId": 1,
  "receiverId": 2
}

3Ô∏è‚É£ TYPING INDICATORS
Subscribe: /topic/channel/{channelId}/typing
Send: /app/channel/{channelId}/typing
Payload:
{
  "username": "john_doe",
  "typing": true
}

4Ô∏è‚É£ NOTIFICATIONS
Subscribe: /user/queue/notifications
(Server-sent only)

5Ô∏è‚É£ ONLINE STATUS
Subscribe: /topic/online-status
(Broadcasts when users connect/disconnect)

üí° TIP: Use this request to verify the server is running before WebSocket testing

üîß WSCAT WEBSOCKET TESTING
==========================

1Ô∏è‚É£ Install wscat:
npm install -g wscat

2Ô∏è‚É£ Connect (for basic WebSocket without STOMP):
wscat -c "ws://localhost:8081/ws?token=YOUR_JWT_TOKEN"

‚ö†Ô∏è NOTE: wscat works with raw WebSocket but our server uses STOMP protocol.
For STOMP testing, use the Browser Console or Node.js scripts.

3Ô∏è‚É£ Alternative - Use Apic WebSocket Client:
- Download from: https://apic.app/
- Supports STOMP protocol
- GUI-based testing

4Ô∏è‚É£ Alternative - Use websocat:
cargo install websocat
websocat ws://localhost:8081/ws?token=YOUR_TOKEN

üìã STOMP FRAME FORMAT
--------------------
CONNECT frame:
CONNECT
accept-version:1.2
host:localhost
Authorization:Bearer YOUR_TOKEN

^@

SUBSCRIBE frame:
SUBSCRIBE
id:sub-0
destination:/topic/channel/1

^@

SEND frame:
SEND
destination:/app/channel/1/message
content-type:application/json

{"content":"Hello","channelId":1,"senderId":1}
^@

(^@ is the NULL character, Ctrl+@)
